channel.title: How do I turn NPC'S round?
channel.description: All my Npc's face south when i add them to the game, could someone tell me how to get them to face other directions (north, east, west). I know it can be done, ive seen it on many other servers. And before some smart kid says to google it or check for guides on how to do it, I HAVE ALREADY and have found nothing.
